snippet.title: LostMagic
snippet.description:
Welcome to LostMagic - a true role-playing game in the best traditions of the old school. Here you will come face to face with the secrets of a mysterious world where people from Earth came to fight for the remnants of magical energy. Join secret organizations, solve riddles and find fascinating Easter eggs. Coming soon! 

Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3220170/LostMagic/

key mailer: https://www.keymailer.co/g/games/a26b8939
